plane_of_light.name: Plane of Light
plane_of_light.description: A radiant plane caught between salvation and domination.

celestial_court.name: Fields of Redemption
celestial_court.description: Golden fields and radiant spires where dawn never fades. Healing light and warmth flow freely here.

dread_lords.name: The Blazing Planes
dread_lords.description: Molten rivers and burning skies where tyrants are forged in torment.

verdant_wilds.name: Verdant Wilds
verdant_wilds.description: The endless struggle between growth and entropy manifests here.

celestial_court.name: Emerald Canopy
celestial_court.description: Twisting forests, floating islands, and fertile rivers, alive with growth and vibrant energy.

dread_lords.name: Withering Expanse
dread_lords.description: Storm-ravaged lands, jagged rocks, and forests choking under entropy, hunger, and decay.

civilisation_heights.name: Civilisation Heights
civilisation_heights.description: The battleground of ideology, law, and conquest.

celestial_court.name: Monumental Courts
celestial_court.description: Towering cities, structured roads, and grand halls dedicated to justice and order.

dread_lords.name: Shadow Bastions
dread_lords.description: Fortresses of domination, siegeworks, and smoke-choked towns where cruelty reigns.

molten_bastion.name: Molten Bastion
molten_bastion.description: Where creation and enslavement clash in steel and fire.

celestial_court.name: Molten Heights
celestial_court.description: Vast forges, molten rivers, and mountains echoing with the clang of creation and invention.

dread_lords.name: Chains of Iron
dread_lords.description: Smoke-choked valleys filled with enslaved laborers, torturous devices, and cruel machinery.

arcane_peaks.name: Arcane Peaks
arcane_peaks.description: The battlefield of beauty, magic, and deceit.

celestial_court.name: Crystal Spires
celestial_court.description: Floating gardens and spires shimmering with magic, art, and radiant beauty.

dread_lords.name: Webbed Shadows
dread_lords.description: Canyons darkened by webs and illusions, where deceit and monstrous creations lurk.

dawnspire.name: Dawnspire
dawnspire.description: A land of agricultural peace, threatened by war and hatred.

celestial_court.name: Golden Plains
celestial_court.description: Sun-drenched fields and fertile lands where agriculture and time flow in harmony.

dread_lords.name: Scorched Battlefields
dread_lords.description: Shattered towns, burned plains, and the chaotic remnants of war driven by rage.

misted_paths.name: Misted Paths
misted_paths.description: A realm of chance, trickery, and deadly secrets.

celestial_court.name: Foggy Glens
celestial_court.description: Twisting fog-laden paths and mysterious crossroads alive with luck and trickery.

dread_lords.name: Shadow Alleys
dread_lords.description: Silent, poisonous corridors where assassins and dark forces prowl.

shadowed_vale.name: Shadowed Vale
shadowed_vale.description: Where love, secrets, and torture entwine.

celestial_court.name: Veiled Groves
celestial_court.description: Hidden valleys and reflective lakes where illusion and love flourish.

dread_lords.name: Iron Prisons
dread_lords.description: Deep caverns filled with enslaved mortals and the tools of torture.

celestial_peaks.name: Celestial Peaks
celestial_peaks.description: The home of dragonkind and their eternal struggle.

celestial_court.name: Golden Spires
celestial_court.description: Snow-capped peaks adorned with golden and silver dragons of nobility.

dread_lords.name: Chromatic Abyss
dread_lords.description: Volcanic fissures and magma flows where chaotic chromatic dragons wreak havoc.

library_of_knowledge.name: Library of Knowledge
library_of_knowledge.description: Endless pursuit of wisdom and forbidden power.

celestial_court.name: Luminous Halls
celestial_court.description: Floating libraries and towers filled with knowledge, prophecy, and skill.

dread_lords.name: Necrotic Archives
dread_lords.description: Cursed tomes, spectral scribes, and undead librarians guarding forbidden knowledge.

deathlands.name: Deathlands
deathlands.description: A realm where death and undeath intertwine.

celestial_court.name: Silent Graves
celestial_court.description: Ossuaries and tombstones where fate and memory are preserved.

dread_lords.name: Necrotic Mists
dread_lords.description: Haunted forests and landscapes of undeath and gluttony.

stormlands.name: Stormlands
stormlands.description: The domain of tempestuous battle and uncontrolled fury.

celestial_court.name: Thunder Peaks
celestial_court.description: Mountains split by lightning, crashing seas, and storms filled with strength.

dread_lords.name: Savage Wastes
dread_lords.description: Wildlands where monstrous beasts roam unchecked amidst violent storms.

pandemonium.name: Pandemonium
pandemonium.description: A chaotic, windswept labyrinth of endless storms and shifting landscapes. Reality bends unpredictably, and whispers of madness echo across jagged cliffs and dark chasms. Mortals who enter risk losing their minds—or discovering hidden truths about themselves in the chaos.

nine_hells.name: Nine Hells
nine_hells.description: A realm of law and cruelty, where every action is weighed, judged, and punished. Infernal hierarchies dominate, and ambition, fear, and suffering drive the denizens to rise—or fall—through nine meticulously ordered layers.
